REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1785 reute d f BC-ARRAYS-<ARAY>-COMPLET 04-13 0056

TEXT.TITLE: ARRAYS <ARAY> COMPLETES MERGER
TEXT.BODY: Arrays Inc said it completed its merger with Haba Systems Inc. Terms of the merger called for each share of Arrays to be exchange for a share of Haba in a transaction valued at 4.1 mln dlrs, the company said. Both companies produce and market microcomputer software. Reuter
